items.name: awesome
items.summary: A comprehensive collection of curated lists covering a wide range of topics in technology, science, and beyond. It serves as a valuable resource for developers, researchers, and enthusiasts seeking high-quality references, tools, and learning materials. Its strength lies in community-driven curation and broad applicability across domains. Ideal for discovering and sharing well-organized knowledge repositories.
items.summary_en: A comprehensive collection of curated lists covering a wide range of topics in technology, science, and beyond. It serves as a valuable resource for developers, researchers, and enthusiasts seeking high-quality references, tools, and learning materials. Its strength lies in community-driven curation and broad applicability across domains. Ideal for discovering and sharing well-organized knowledge repositories.
items.summary_zh: 这是一个由社区维护的精选资源集合项目，收录了各类技术领域的优质内容列表。项目采用 CC0 开源协议，允许自由使用和分发。涵盖主题广泛，包括编程语言、工具、框架和设计资源等，适合开发者快速获取高质量的学习参考资料。目前已在 GitHub 上获得大量关注，是技术人员常用的资源导航工具。
items.summary_es: Proyecto que recopila listas curadas de recursos de alta calidad en diversos temas tecnológicos y académicos. Destaca por su organización sistemática, criterio de selección riguroso y mantenimiento comunitario. Ideal para desarrolladores, investigadores y estudiantes que buscan referencias confiables. Su licencia abierta permite uso y adaptación sin restricciones.

items.name: public-apis
items.summary: Public-APIs is a comprehensive, curated collection of free APIs for developers, covering a wide range of categories such as entertainment, finance, and data. It serves as a valuable resource for prototyping, learning, and integrating external services into applications without cost barriers. The project is community-driven, ensuring regular updates and diverse, practical options. Its open-source nature and clear categorization make it highly accessible and useful for both beginners and experienced developers.
items.summary_en: Public-APIs is a comprehensive, curated collection of free APIs for developers, covering a wide range of categories such as entertainment, finance, and data. It serves as a valuable resource for prototyping, learning, and integrating external services into applications without cost barriers. The project is community-driven, ensuring regular updates and diverse, practical options. Its open-source nature and clear categorization make it highly accessible and useful for both beginners and experienced developers.
items.summary_zh: 这是一个由社区维护的免费 API 集合项目，收录了涵盖多个领域的公共 API，包括新闻、天气、金融、娱乐等。所有 API 均经过筛选，确保可用性和免费访问权限，并提供清晰的分类和文档链接。该项目适合开发者、学生或技术爱好者快速查找和使用各类开放数据接口，可用于原型开发、学习或小型项目。由于其开源和持续更新的特性，已成为开发者社区中广泛使用的资源库之一。
items.summary_es: Lista colaborativa de APIs gratuitas y públicas para desarrollo. Incluye múltiples categorías como negocios, IA, entretenimiento y más. Facilita la integración de servicios externos sin coste. Ideal para prototipado rápido y aprendizaje de consumo de APIs.

items.name: freeCodeCamp
items.summary: freeCodeCamp is an open-source educational platform offering a comprehensive curriculum in programming, math, and computer science. It provides hands-on coding challenges, projects, and certifications, all accessible for free. The platform is ideal for self-learners and career-changers seeking practical, industry-relevant skills. Its strong community support and structured learning paths make it a widely trusted resource for coding education.
items.summary_en: freeCodeCamp is an open-source educational platform offering a comprehensive curriculum in programming, math, and computer science. It provides hands-on coding challenges, projects, and certifications, all accessible for free. The platform is ideal for self-learners and career-changers seeking practical, industry-relevant skills. Its strong community support and structured learning paths make it a widely trusted resource for coding education.
items.summary_zh: freeCodeCamp 是一个开源编程学习平台，提供完整的计算机科学和编程课程。其课程内容涵盖数学基础、JavaScript、D3.js 等核心技术，并支持在线练习与项目实践。用户可以通过完成认证项目获得行业认可的证书，适合自学编程和职业转型的人群。平台以社区驱动，强调实践与协作，所有资源永久免费。
items.summary_es: freeCodeCamp es una plataforma educativa de código abierto que ofrece un plan de estudios completo para aprender programación y ciencias de la computación. Su currículo abarca desde fundamentos hasta desarrollo full-stack, incluyendo JavaScript, D3 y certificaciones. Es ideal para principiantes y quienes buscan transicionar a carreras tecnológicas. La comunidad activa y el contenido gratuito lo hacen ampliamente accesible.

items.name: free-programming-books
items.summary: A comprehensive, community-curated collection of freely available programming books covering a wide range of languages, tools, and topics. Ideal for self-learners, students, and educators seeking accessible educational resources. Organized by language and subject, it supports multiple formats and languages, making it a versatile reference for skill development. Its open, collaborative nature ensures continuous updates and broad applicability.
items.summary_en: A comprehensive, community-curated collection of freely available programming books covering a wide range of languages, tools, and topics. Ideal for self-learners, students, and educators seeking accessible educational resources. Organized by language and subject, it supports multiple formats and languages, making it a versatile reference for skill development. Its open, collaborative nature ensures continuous updates and broad applicability.
items.summary_zh: 这是一个由EbookFoundation维护的开源项目，收集了大量免费编程书籍资源。内容涵盖多种编程语言、框架和计算机科学主题，所有资源均遵循开放许可协议。该项目适合开发者、学生以及自学者查找高质量的学习材料，支持按语言和主题分类浏览。资源类型包括电子书、在线课程和编程指南，所有内容均可自由使用和分发。
items.summary_es: Repositorio colaborativo que recopila libros gratuitos sobre programación y desarrollo de software. Incluye recursos educativos en múltiples idiomas y formatos, organizados por temáticas y lenguajes. Destaca por su amplia cobertura, mantenimiento comunitario y licencia abierta. Ideal para estudiantes y desarrolladores que buscan material de aprendizaje accesible.

items.name: coding-interview-university
items.summary: Coding Interview University is a comprehensive, open-source study plan for software engineering interviews. It covers essential computer science topics, including algorithms and data structures, through structured learning paths. The resource is widely used for interview preparation, offering practical exercises and real-world problem-solving techniques. Its community-driven approach and extensive content make it valuable for both beginners and experienced developers seeking to strengthen their technical skills.
items.summary_en: Coding Interview University is a comprehensive, open-source study plan for software engineering interviews. It covers essential computer science topics, including algorithms and data structures, through structured learning paths. The resource is widely used for interview preparation, offering practical exercises and real-world problem-solving techniques. Its community-driven approach and extensive content make it valuable for both beginners and experienced developers seeking to strengthen their technical skills.
items.summary_zh: 这是一个面向软件工程师求职面试的完整计算机科学学习计划。项目提供了系统性的学习路线，涵盖数据结构、算法、系统设计等核心计算机科学主题。内容全面且结构化，适合准备技术面试或系统复习计算机基础知识的学习者。通过实践导向的学习材料和练习题目，帮助用户扎实掌握面试所需的关键技能。
items.summary_es: Un plan de estudios completo para preparar entrevistas técnicas de desarrollo de software. Incluye algoritmos, estructuras de datos y conceptos fundamentales de ciencias de la computación. Destaca por su enfoque estructurado y contenido detallado. Ideal para aspirantes a ingenieros de software que buscan reforzar conocimientos técnicos.

items.name: react
items.summary: React is a declarative JavaScript library for building user interfaces across web and native platforms. It excels in creating reusable UI components, enabling efficient development of complex, interactive applications. Its virtual DOM implementation optimizes rendering performance, making it suitable for high-traffic sites and dynamic content. Widely adopted in frontend development, React is ideal for single-page applications, mobile apps, and scalable enterprise solutions.
items.summary_en: React is a declarative JavaScript library for building user interfaces across web and native platforms. It excels in creating reusable UI components, enabling efficient development of complex, interactive applications. Its virtual DOM implementation optimizes rendering performance, making it suitable for high-traffic sites and dynamic content. Widely adopted in frontend development, React is ideal for single-page applications, mobile apps, and scalable enterprise solutions.
items.summary_zh: React 是由 Facebook 开发并开源的 JavaScript 库，专注于构建用户界面。它采用声明式编程范式，使开发者能够高效地设计和维护复杂的 UI 组件。React 支持 Web 和原生应用开发，具备虚拟 DOM 和组件化架构等核心特性，提升了渲染性能和开发体验。该库适用于构建单页应用、动态网站以及跨平台移动应用，是前端开发领域的主流选择之一。
items.summary_es: React es una biblioteca JavaScript declarativa para construir interfaces de usuario web y nativas. Destaca por su enfoque basado en componentes, virtual DOM para alto rendimiento y reactividad unidireccional. Ideal para aplicaciones dinámicas y escalables, desde SPAs hasta apps móviles con React Native.
